questionsData.title: The pH scale measures the concentration of iron.
questionsData.explain_answer:
pH scale measures the concentration of hydrogen ions.

The concentration of hydrogen ions (H+) is measured on the pH scale.
The pH scale indeed measures the concentration of hydrogen ions, not just "hydrogen" in general.  Hydrogen atoms can exist in different forms, but the pH scale specifically focuses on free-floating hydrogen ions (H+).

Vibration is the source of sound.
A vaccine for smallpox is common these days.
We see half of the moon because it spins on its own axis.

Llamas live in hot places.
Breakfast is the meal which you have at night.
Come into operation is to start working.
Brilliant and wonderful are words used to describe a nightmare.
"To rush like a hurricane " means "to move very quickly".
"Work with bare hands' means " without using any tools or equipment".
"In your position" and " if I were in your shoes" give the same meaning.
Somebody who guides tourists is a life-guard.
questionsData.explain_answer: Somebody who guides tourists is a Tourist guide .

questionsData.title: Pears are grain crops.
"Simmer' means "boil gently'.
"More and more" is the synonym of "less and less".
Sailors put the oars on the mast.
"Stained with blood" means "covered with blood".
The text is mainly talking about…….
questionsData.article: Everyday life can be full of stress. There are many possible causes, work or family problems, exams at school, traffic, or noise. This stress has many bad effects on your body and mind. It can make you unhappy and even ill. To reduce stress, psychologists say that the most important thing is not to get (angry 2) or upset about something. Instead you should try to laugh. If you can make a joke and laugh, you’ll feel better. In fact, doctors say that laughter is good for your mental health. (It 3) makes your body stronger, so you are less likely to get sick. Another way to reduce stress is to do something you enjoy. It doesn’t matter what activity you (choose 1). Some people relax by watching a movie, others by playing basketball or cooking a nice dinner. If you like chocolate, for example, eat a small piece when you feel stressed. As long as there are ways to get rid of stress, we should try to follow those ways, otherwise we will be the victims of it.

questionsData.title: Smallpox is …. epidemic.
The word…… is a compound word.
The word "acidity" is a/an ……
The suffix ….... changes the word "dark" into a noun.
The …… flood took place in Sudan in 2020.
………. Ashraf plays football, his brother doesn’t.
You have ……. remove the scales of the fish before cooking.
Sana'a ……I was born, is a big city.
He lives beside his company, ….. he reaches work early.
In yesterday's crash, three men were ……injured.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The best option to complete the sentence is:Badly

Here's why:

Badly is an adverb that modifies the verb "injured" and describes the severity of the injuries.
Bad is an adjective and wouldn't be used in this context to modify a verb.
Worst and Worse are comparative and superlative adjectives, respectively. They would be used for comparing the severity of injuries between multiple groups, which isn't the case here.

questionsData.title: The strongest earthquake ……. in Dhamar in 1982.
The students will…….a trip next week.
She was ……TV when she heard the striking news.
If the restaurant is clean, I …….. with my family.
Sameer was …. to design a simple experiment.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Sameer was asked to design a simple experiment.)(

The tense used in the sentence "Sameer was asked to ....." is the past tense. In this sentence, "was asked" is in the past tense, specifically the past passive tense. It indicates that Sameer received the request or task of designing the experiment in the past.
